Description: Chrome tone Pocket watch and gift box, with photo and text engraving The watch can be engraved with any text or photo - perfect results every time We can do logo's, but we can not do registered trademarks such as football club emblems etc How many characters can I have engraved? You can have up to 100 characters engraved Buy with confidence Trustworthy eBay seller with over 34,000 positive feedbacks, buy with complete confidence. Fonts You may choose any of the fonts below for the engraving, if you do not select a font I will choose whichever looks best (usually English Script) Choosing your engraved message Please contact us after you order with your specifications Photo Engraving - Sending your photo After you place your order, please visit www.luxuryengravedgifts.co.uk/aupload/to send us your photo Photo engraving samples Turnaround / Delivery We aim to engrave and dispatch all items within 24 hours. We use first class post for all orders Questions If you have any questions, please feel free to ask FAQ. (Frequently asked questions) Get an instant answer to your question here. How long for delivery? We usually post items within 24 hours. Unengraved - Estimated 1 - 2 working days (estimated, not guaranteed) Engraved - Estimated 2 - 3 working days (estimated, not guaranteed) Has my item been posted? Your eBay purchase history will tell you if your item has been posted. Typically, items are posted within 24 hours. I need something really fast! Our delivery speed is the same for everyone, we treat all customers equally & therefore we can not give anyone preferential treatment. Almost all orders are dispatched within 24 hours, but we can not guarantee you an exact delivery date. How do I tell you what I want engraved? Please send us a message through the eBay system. Have you received my engraving request? If you have sent it through the eBay system, then yes. If for some reason we haven't received it, we will contact you. Characters and lines? We can, in theory engrave any amount of letters on to any item, however the more letters you have, the smaller the writing will be. For this reason we recommend around 60 characters for most items. We can do more but please be aware that the text size will get progressively smaller as more letters are added. Can I see a proof before you post? Please be assured that we provide a quality finish, evident by our extremely high eBay feedback. Creating & emailing a proof is quite time consuming, especially if we did it for everyone, so unfortunately we can not provide a proof. Can you engrave both sides? (or for double dog tags, both tags front & rear?) Yes :-) Why haven't you replied to my email or message? We aim to reply within 24 hours or less (usually less). If it has been over 24 hours please send your message again. My order hasn't arrived? Most items arrive within a couple of days, but please allow 7 working days from payment before asking us where your item is. What is your VAT number GB161259320 MPN PWC Brand Luxury Engraved Gifts Material Stainless Steel Case Colour Silver

ReturnPolicy.Description:
Is there a purchase return guarantee?

If, for some reason, you are not satisfied with the product you ordered, you can send it back to us. Of course we would undertake the shipping cost in the case that it is the consequence of a mistake on our side. 	

Is it possible to swap the product? 
We will send you another product as soon as we receive the returned package.
We cover the postage cost of the second product in the case that it is due to a mistake on our side. If you change your mind about the product and return it to us, you will be asked to contribute to the product shipping costs. 								

Conditions of the returned product:
Please note that in order to receive a full refund of the product price, or an exchange of equal value, we will ask you to return the product in the same conditions as when we sent it to you.

Title: Photo & text engraved / personalised chrome tone pocket watch + gift box - PWC
